chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes
Muy bien, aquí estamos en el punto de partida.
a mi izquierda hay una ramita que va a una isla con un tigre. ¿Adónde vamos ahora, amigo?
to the island of the macaw
ahhh, genial! así que vamos al sudoeste, hacia la isla grande con el loro en el árbol, ¿verdad?
On the island there is an elephant then let's go with the frog
OK! So, I should go southeast of the parrot to the 3 rocks that lead to Toad Island, right?
correct to then continue through giraffe island and then reach treasure island
¡está bien! Así que voy a la izquierda desde Frog Island para ver al sr. cocodrilo, luego más a la izquierda para reunirse con el elefante

Desde allí, me dirijo al oeste para llegar a la isla Jirafa. y luego, desde la isla jirafa, voy al sureste para ocuparme de la serpiente y, finalmente, doy dos pasos hacia el este para conseguir el tesoro. ¿Lo entendí bien?
yes
¡genial! aquí me voy hacia la isla del tesoro
*finished* ¡dime cuándo estés listo para la próxima ronda de este juego!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
hello let's go sailing
aye-aye, captain! first, navigate a few steps to the left, passing below a wooden bench
cross that trail towards the florist stand
Thank you and then what do I do?
here's the twist! make a u-turn to the left before reaching the florist stand
back towards the trail and the cute white dog you passed. got it?
ok, and then what direction to take
¡excelente! Ahora, ve hacia el sur, pasa la rama y sigue bajando.
¡Otro perro blanco te recibirá en un picnic!
perfect I clearly see the white dog with the picnic
¡excelente! Ahora pasa por encima de esa alfombra de picnic, simplemente rozando ese plato de bayas.
A continuación, irás hacia el oeste.
copied
¡impresionante! Ahora verás una rama de madera cruzando el río.
cruzarlo hacia el norte
I see it perfectly
great job! now, steer clear of the green bush, and circle it on the right side
ready?
yes
brilliant! After that, you will reach the florist's stall
ok
once you get there, take a left, and wander beneath the stand

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
yes
cool, i'm at the tent on the northern end of the map
where to next?
you must follow the route drawn passing by where the dog is
¡está bien! Pasó al perro, está pasando el rato junto al fuego.
¿Es ese hongo rojo el siguiente?
Follow the route, then you make a turn on a very sharp curve where there is a blue vehicle.
got it, just passed the red 'shroom
heading towards the blue car now
keep moving forward and find a telescope
Muy bien, acabo de pasar el auto azul.
vamos a ver. ¡Ah, ahí está el telescopio azul! Dirigido hacia eso ahora
Then you turn completely and in the opposite direction, you will find a circular mountain
ok, solo toca el telescopio azul
dando la vuelta ahora
In the middle of the mountain in the shape of a circle is the hidden house
ahh I understand! I see the rocks, they seem to be surrounding something
I hope from it

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
great! start by going under the first palm tree to your south-west
then, turn right to cross the second palm tree. after that, make a sharp left before the third tree, heading south!
very good, and then where am I going?
Luego, camina hacia la izquierda del pequeño cachorro marrón que ves allí.
gire ligeramente a la izquierda y luego a la derecha hacia el sur, ¡siga adelante!
ok, I see two rocks in front and then a ball
nice! head between the big rock on your left and the small rock to your right
go towards the water, don't be shy!
ok, but I see a dangerous crab on the river bank
¡Ja! No te preocupes, gira a la derecha en el cangrejo y sigue la gran roca de tu lado, sigue hacia el oeste en el agua.
ready
perfecto! ahora, sigue hasta la tercera roca, la de tamaño medio
cuando ves al tiburón, gira con fuerza a la derecha
wow, I see a big shark in front
no te preocupes, amigo! ahora sal del agua y cruza entre la roca mediana y la pelota tricolor
luego, continúa hacia el norte
ready
¡impresionante! Gire ligeramente a la izquierda y diríjase al noroeste.
Verás una carpa roja a tu izquierda y un gran altavoz a tu derecha. navegar entre ellos
thanks I see it
de nada! ahora, da un rodeo alrededor de la tienda en forma de arco
ready
Now head south towards the water, but stop just before you reach
ok
Ahora gira a la derecha, en dirección oeste, y ve justo debajo del kayak rojo que ves.

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: Sometimes it is necessary to change the language depending on the moment and the people with whom you want to communicate
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: I sometimes like to exchange language
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
